body.name: HotYeah Portable Monitor, 16.1in 1080P FHD Laptop Monitor USB-C HDMI External Computer Display HDR IPS Gaming Monitor w/Smart Cover & Speaker, 2nd Screen for PC Mac Phone Switch PS5
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 36 mins
features: 🌈1080P FHD Screen - Compared with other 15.6’’ screens, HotYeah portable monitor adapts a larger 16.1’’ 1080P IPS panel and brings you a 178°viewing angle. 72% NTSC color gamut, 16.7M color display, and 6800K color temperature help render more accurate color, drawing you into the stream video and games with life-to-true scenes and excellent details. No-flickering low blue light tech reduces eyestrain greatly and makes it easier for a long-time watch when working, gaming, and traveling.

💻USB-C HDMI Compatibility - Features with 2 full-function USB-C ports and 1 Mini-HDMI port, HotYeah external monitor works well with most laptops, PCs, phones, tablets, and game devices like Switch, PS5/4, XBOX, Wii, etc. Plug and play, no driver or app. Only one USB-C cable is needed for connection and say goodbye to redundant cables! Note: Your device should support Thunderbolt 3.0/4.0 or USB 3.1 Type-C DP ALT-MODE. The extra OTG port is designed for your keyboard or mouse.

▶️Multiple Flexible Modes - HotYeah laptop monitor can be used as the main screen alone. Also, you can mirror your laptop screen with your colleagues in meetings or extend your laptop window tags for multi-tasks, increasing productivity by 300%. Mirror your phone screen to enjoy a clear movie or duplicate your Switch to gain a better gaming experience. Optional landscape and portrait modes can be adjusted to handle different work like editing photos, reading documents, and analyzing data.

🧲2-in-1 Smart Stand - Made of high-quality PU leather material, the cover features durable, scratch-proof, water-proof, and stylish nature. You can put it on a backpack without worries, take the USB-C monitor anywhere, and quickly mirror or extend the screen when working outside. Fold the groove on the cover bottom, double as a stand. Put the monitor on the 1st or 2nd groove to gain a different view based on your need.

⚡️Lightweight Travel Monitor - 1.38lbs weight, 0.23-inch frame. Slim, lightweight, and travel-friendly becomes the synonym for HotYeah portable monitor. It provides an extra screen and organized workshop during business trips and offers maximum entertainment pleasure with HDR tech when traveling. HotYeah computer monitor comes with anything you need for connection, and we always stand by our product and offer 1-year after-sale service and 24/7 online support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome portable display solution with a host of features.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The **HotYeah Portable Monitor** has truly elevated my on-the-go mobile computing experience, and here's why:**Sleek and Portable Design:**The first thing that caught my attention is the monitor's sleek and ultra-portable design. Weighing in at just the right balance between lightweight and sturdy, it's perfect for those who are always on the move. The slim profile makes it easy to slip into my laptop bag, turning any space into a potential workstation.**Vibrant Full HD Display:**The 16.1-inch Full HD display with HDR support delivers vibrant and sharp visuals. Whether I'm working on documents, watching videos, or indulging in some gaming, the monitor's clarity and color reproduction are impressive. The HDR capability adds depth to the visuals, making every detail pop.**Versatile Connectivity:**The monitor's versatility in connectivity is a standout feature. With USB-C and HDMI ports, it effortlessly connects to a variety of devices. I appreciate the compatibility with laptops, smartphones, gaming consoles like PS5, and even my Nintendo Switch. This flexibility makes it a true second screen for almost anything.**Easy Setup with Smart Cover:**Setting up the monitor is a breeze, thanks to the user-friendly design. The smart cover not only protects the screen during transport but also serves as a stand that supports multiple viewing angles. The magnetic attachment makes it quick to set up and fold away, adding a layer of convenience to the entire experience.**Integrated Speaker for Audio Convenience:**The inclusion of integrated speakers is a thoughtful touch. While not audiophile-level, they provide decent sound quality for casual media consumption and video calls. It eliminates the need for additional external speakers or headphones when I want to keep things simple.**Responsive Touch Controls:**Navigating through the monitor's settings is made easy with the responsive touch controls. Adjusting brightness, contrast, and other settings is intuitive, and the on-screen menu is straightforward. This attention to user-friendly controls enhances the overall user experience.**Enhanced Productivity with Dual Screens:**As someone who values productivity, having a portable dual-screen setup has been a game-changer. Whether extending my laptop display for multitasking or mirroring my phone for a larger view, the HotYeah monitor has proven to be a versatile tool for boosting productivity on the go.**Durability and Build Quality:**The monitor's build quality instills confidence. The materials used feel durable, and the overall construction is robust. This reassures me that it can withstand the rigors of frequent travel without compromising on performance.**Affordable and Feature-Rich:**Considering the features it offers, the HotYeah Portable Monitor is reasonably priced. It strikes a great balance between affordability and functionality, making it accessible to a wide range of users looking to enhance their mobile computing experience.In conclusion, the HotYeah Portable Monitor has become an integral part of my mobile work and entertainment setup. Its combination of portability, impressive display quality, and versatile connectivity make it a valuable accessory for those who require a reliable second screen wherever they go. Whether for work or play, this monitor delivers on its promise of convenience and performance. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a portable display solution with a host of features. Good price for 16.1 screen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent and Versatile!
reviews.reviewText: So far this monitor has been better than expected. I have used it with my MacBook Pro with only USB-C, my MSI Katana 17 gaming laptop with only a USB-C and mirrored on my iPad Pro. All looked pretty good hooked up, and with only connected to USB-C makes this very mobile. It actually fits with my MSI laptop in my case together taking up hardly any additional space. The stand isn’t ideal, but to make it truly a portable monitor, I will tolerate…it’s not horrible. The picture is really good at 1080p and pairs up so easily with either MacOS or Win11. If you are looking for an awesome extra monitor to take on the road, or at least reduce the amount of cables used, especially if you have USB-C or Thunderbolt, this is the monitor for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I'm not one to leave reviews but I recently moved overseas and was allowed to keep working remotely for my company. I needed an easy, travel-friendly, lightweight option to use as an additional computer monitor for my laptop and was surprised by the quality, portability, and value of the HotYeah monitor. Despite never hearing of the HotYeah brand before, this has made working remote - whether from a home office, hotel lobby, or coffee shop - so much easier than flipping back and forth between screens on my laptop and it takes up virtually no space in my work bag. Very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and functional but not great picture/color quality
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality isn't quite right on this, and the settings to adjust color are wonky and don't really give you what you need. I don't mind much because I just need this screen for coding and work but the aspect ratio of this screen is better suited for media, which I wouldn't recommend. If you don't mind the low picture quality, the resolution is fine and it gets to 60 FPS which makes it good for games. I didn't have a way to test latency however. Tested with ipad and macbook and it worked without hassles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: Very happy so far. I use a Microsoft Surface Pro and wanted some more real estate that was easy to pull out to use at the kitchen table or something without having to get out a big monitor with power cords. I am able to use only the USB C to connect and that's it. Nice image quality. The speakers on my Surface sound better, but I didn't buy this for speakers. Well worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great Monitor
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this for my marketing business as I needed something that would extend my viewing without having to close out windows. This exceeded all of my expectations too. Super easy to use and setup, solid well made construction that shows it will last.The easy set up and how easily it is to work, proves that this is a must have for anyone that works on computers and the price point pulls it all together. It has ports on the side that you can hook anything up to and it easily pairs with any laptop or PC.So, with everything it has and all the functions and time saving this little gadget brings it is a must have for all people looking to up their game in their work environment. I Highly recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This monitor connects to a USB type c cable, that connects directly to your android phone. Sound can be played on phone or out of monitor. Comes with 3 cables and can also be connected to laptops. Works great,I haven't had a problem in the couple months that I had it👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No need to download any software drivers, just connect with usb-c chord and it’s automatically detected. Lots of screen settings to change display effects/brightness/etc. the movie display is my fave so far. Super lightweight and easy to prop up with the cover.
